text: The 2015–16 NHL season was the 99th season of operation (98th season of play) of the National Hockey League (NHL). Thirty teams competed. There were 82 games in the regular season from October 7, 2015 to April 10, 2016. The 2016 Stanley Cup playoffs began on April 13, 2016 and ended June 12. The Pittsburgh Penguins won their fourth Stanley Cup. None of the seven Canadian-based teams qualified for the playoffs. The only other time in league history with no Canadian teams in the playoffs was in 1970. ==References== ==Other websites== *NHL.com Category:2015 in ice hockey Category:2016 in ice hockey Category:National Hockey League seasons Category:2015 in North America Category:2016 in North America
title: 2015–16 NHL season
